overview: The film follows Monique Covet through four scenes. Cold House: In a cold house Monique and two female companions encounter 2 guys among the hanging meat. Studio with cages and stuffed animals: Red leather clad and whip wielding Monique plays a lion tamer. Workshop: Amidst the grime and flames we find two men and Monique with a pair of female friends. title: The Splendor of Hell
